Circles Wallpaper

Originally made as an experiment in Dithering. This wallpaper uses a slight grain to disperse and hide banding artifacts that appear in gradients which don't posess enough colour depth to appear smooth.
Download the full 5k (5120x2880) image for use as a wallpaper Here!
